mapper.insert: insert into message(order_id, title, content, create_time) values (#{orderId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createTime});
insert into message (order_id, title, content, create_time, send_user, receive_user, status) values (#{orderId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{sendUser}, #{receiveUser}, #{status});
mapper.update: update notice_user set status = 1 where user_id = #{userId} and notice_id = #{noticeId};
update food_order set status = #{status} where order_id = #{orderId} and food_id = #{foodId};
mapper.select: select t_order.order_id, t_order.table_id, u.user_id, u.username, t_order.memo from t_order join user u on t_order.user_id = u.user_id where t_order.order_id = #{orderId};
select f.food_id, f.food_name, fo.num_food, fo.status from food_order fo join food f on fo.food_id = f.food_id where fo.order_id = #{orderId};
select user_id, username, portrait from user where user_id = #{userId};
select n.notice_id, n.title, nu.status, n.content, n.create_time from user u join notice_user nu on u.user_id = nu.user_id join notice n on nu.notice_id = n.notice_id where u.user_id = #{userId};
select user_id from user where role = 2;
select user_id from t_order where order_id = #{orderId};
